Package com.company.Controller

Class HandleShowTimeMgr

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.company.Controller.HandleShowTimeMgr
  • public class HandleShowTimeMgr
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the controller of the configuration of ShowTime in a cinema. The class is a part of StaffControl.
    Since:
    2019-11-13

    • Method Detail

      • addShowTimeMgr

        public static boolean addShowTimeMgr​(java.util.ArrayList<Cineplex> CineplexArray,
                                     java.util.ArrayList<Movie> MovieArray,
                                     int cineplexChoice,
                                     int cinemaChoice,
                                     int movieChoice,
                                     int year,
                                     int month,
                                     int day,
                                     int hour,
                                     int minute)
        This method adds a new ShowTime to a cinema, based on the date and time input by staff
        Parameters:
        CineplexArray - Array of Cineplex. One cineplex is chosen to retrieve the wanted cinema
        MovieArray - Array of Movie. One movie is chosen to be used in the new ShowTime
        cineplexChoice - The choice of the staff. It is the index of the chosen Cineplex
        cinemaChoice - The choice of the staff. It is the index of the chosen Cinema
        movieChoice - The choice of the staff. It is the index of the chosen Movie
        year - The year of the new ShowTime
        month - The month of the new ShowTime
        day - The day of the new ShowTime
        hour - The hour of the new ShowTime
        minute - The minute of the new ShowTime
        Returns:
        true if the addition is successful

      • deleteShowTimeMgr

        public static boolean deleteShowTimeMgr​(java.util.ArrayList<Cineplex> CineplexArray,
                                        int cineplexChoice,
                                        int cinemaChoice,
                                        int showTimeChoice)
        This method adds a new ShowTime to a cinema, based on the date and time input by staff
        Parameters:
        CineplexArray - Array of Cineplex. One cineplex is chosen to retrieve the wanted cinema
        cineplexChoice - The choice of the staff. It is the index of the chosen Cineplex
        cinemaChoice - The choice of the staff. It is the index of the chosen Cinema
        showTimeChoice - The choice of the staff. It is the index of the chosen ShowTime
        Returns:
        true if the deletion is successful
